verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> [was] eight שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <WH2977> Josiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <WH7970> thirty וְאַחַת֙ <WH259> and one שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אִמּ֔וֹ <WH517> And his mother's יְדִידָ֥ה <WH3040> [was] Jedidah בַת־ <WH1323> the daughter עֲדָ֖יָה <WH5718> of Adaiah מִבָּצְקַֽת׃ <WH1218> of Boscath

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <WH1980> and walked בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> in all the way דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> of David אָבִ֔יו <WH1> his father וְלֹא־ <WH3808> nor סָ֖ר <WH5493> and turned not aside יָמִ֥ין <WH3225> to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <WH8040> or to the left פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become בִּשְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <WH8083> eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of king יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <WH2977> Josiah שָׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <WH4428> [that] the king אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁפָ֨ן <WH8227> Shaphan בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲצַלְיָ֤הוּ <WH683> of Azaliah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מְשֻׁלָּם֙ <WH4918> of Meshullam הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עֲלֵ֗ה <WH5927> Go up אֶל־ <WH413> to חִלְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH2518> to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> the high וְיַתֵּ֣ם <WH8552> that he may sum אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֔סֶף <WH3701> the silver הַמּוּבָ֖א <WH935> which is brought בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אָסְפ֛וּ <WH622> have gathered שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <WH8104> which the keepers הַסַּ֖ף <WH5592> of the door מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

[וְיִתְּנֹה כ] (וְיִתְּנֻ֗הוּ <WH5414> deliver ק) עַל־ <WH5921> into יַד֙ <WH3027> it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> of the doers הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> of the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <WH6485> that have the oversight [בְּבֵית כ] (בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house ק) יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְיִתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> And let them deliver אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> לְעֹשֵׂ֤י <WH6213> it to the doers הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <WH4399> of the work אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to repair בֶּ֥דֶק <WH919> the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> which [is] in the house

לֶחָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <WH2796> Unto carpenters וְלַבֹּנִ֖ים <WH1129> and builders וְלַגֹּֽדְרִ֑ים <WH1443> and masons וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <WH7069> and to buy עֵצִים֙ <WH6086> timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <WH4274> and hewn לְחַזֵּ֖ק <WH2388> to repair אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

אַ֚ךְ <WH389> Only לֹא־ <WH3808> no יֵחָשֵׁ֣ב <WH2803> Howbeit there was no reckoning made אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> for הַכֶּ֖סֶף <WH3701> with them of the money הַנִּתָּ֣ן <WH5414> that was delivered עַל־ <WH5921> into יָדָ֑ם <WH3027> into their hand כִּ֥י <WH3588> for בֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <WH530> faithfully הֵ֥ם <WH1992> they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <WH6213> because they dealt

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> said חִלְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH2518> And Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <WH3548> priest הַגָּדוֹל֙ <WH1419> the high עַל־ <WH5921> unto שָׁפָ֣ן <WH8227> unto Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <WH5608> the scribe סֵ֧פֶר <WH5612> the book הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <WH8451> of the law מָצָ֖אתִי <WH4672> I have found בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> gave חִלְקִיָּ֧ה <WH2518> And Hilkiah אֶת־ <WH853> הַסֵּ֛פֶר <WH5612> the book אֶל־ <WH413> to שָׁפָ֖ן <WH8227> to Shaphan וַיִּקְרָאֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7121> and he read

וַיָּבֹ֞א <WH935> came שָׁפָ֤ן <WH8227> And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <WH5608> the scribe אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּבָ֑ר <WH1697> word וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and said הִתִּ֤יכוּ <WH5413> have gathered עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5650> Thy servants אֶת־ <WH853> הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <WH3701> the money הַנִּמְצָ֣א <WH4672> that was found בַבַּ֔יִת <WH1004> in the house וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֗הוּ <WH5414> and have delivered עַל־ <WH5921> into יַד֙ <WH3027> it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <WH6213> of them that do הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <WH6485> that have the oversight בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיַּגֵּ֞ד <WH5046> shewed שָׁפָ֤ן <WH8227> And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <WH5608> the scribe לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying סֵ֚פֶר <WH5612> me a book נָ֣תַן <WH5414> hath delivered לִ֔י חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2518> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <WH3548> the priest וַיִּקְרָאֵ֥הוּ <WH7121> read שָׁפָ֖ן <WH8227> And Shaphan לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> it before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> had heard הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And it came to pass when the king אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> the words סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> of the book הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <WH8451> of the law וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <WH7167> that he rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <WH899> his clothes

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king אֶת־ <WH853> חִלְקִיָּ֣ה <WH2518> Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֡ן <WH3548> the priest וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיקָ֣ם <WH296> and Ahikam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שָׁ֠פָן <WH8227> of Shaphan וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַכְבּ֨וֹר <WH5907> and Achbor בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son מִיכָיָ֜ה <WH4320> of Michaiah וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שָׁפָ֣ן <WH8227> and Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <WH5608> the scribe וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> and Asahiah עֶֽבֶד־ <WH5650> a servant הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

לְכוּ֩ <WH1980> Go דִרְשׁ֨וּ <WH1875> ye enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD בַּעֲדִ֣י <WH1157> about וּבְעַד־ <WH1157> about הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> for me and for the people וּבְעַד֙ <WH1157> about כָּל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and for all Judah עַל־ <WH5921> concerning דִּבְרֵ֛י <WH1697> concerning the words הַסֵּ֥פֶר <WH5612> of this book הַנִּמְצָ֖א <WH4672> that is found הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גְדוֹלָ֞ה <WH1419> for great חֲמַ֣ת <WH2534> [is] the wrath יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הִיא֙ <WH1931> that נִצְּתָ֣ה <WH3341> that is kindled בָ֔נוּ עַל֩ <WH5921> concerning אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> after לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שָׁמְע֜וּ <WH8085> have not hearkened אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> against us because our fathers עַל־ <WH5921> concerning דִּבְרֵי֙ <WH1697> unto the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <WH5612> of this book הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to do כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַכָּת֥וּב <WH3789> according unto all that which is written עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <WH5921> concerning

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went חִלְקִיָּ֣הוּ <WH2518> So Hilkiah הַ֠כֹּהֵן <WH3548> the priest וַאֲחִיקָ֨ם <WH296> and Ahikam וְעַכְבּ֜וֹר <WH5907> and Achbor וְשָׁפָ֣ן <WH8227> and Shaphan וַעֲשָׂיָ֗ה <WH6222> and Asahiah אֶל־ <WH413> to חֻלְדָּ֨ה <WH2468> unto Huldah הַנְּבִיאָ֜ה <WH5031> the prophetess אֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH802> the wife שַׁלֻּ֣ם <WH7967> of Shallum בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son תִּקְוָ֗ה <WH8616> of Tikvah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חַרְחַס֙ <WH2745> of Harhas שֹׁמֵ֣ר <WH8104> keeper הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> of the wardrobe וְהִ֛יא <WH1931> she יֹשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH3427> (now she dwelt בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem בַּמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <WH4932> the Second וַֽיְדַבְּר֖וּ <WH1696> spoke אֵלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH413> about

וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And she said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אִמְר֣וּ <WH559> Tell לָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who שָׁלַ֥ח <WH7971> that sent אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֵלָֽי׃ <WH413> about

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold מֵבִ֥יא <WH935> Behold I will bring רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> evil אֶל־ <WH413> about הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְעַל־ <WH5921> and יֹֽשְׁבָ֑יו <WH3427> and upon the inhabitants אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> thereof [even] all the words הַסֵּ֔פֶר <WH5612> of the book אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which קָרָ֖א <WH7121> hath read מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> which the king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah

תַּ֣חַת ׀ <WH8478> Thahash אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they עֲזָב֗וּנִי <WH5800> Because they have forsaken וַֽיְקַטְּרוּ֙ <WH6999> me and have burned incense לֵאלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> unto other לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> might הַכְעִיסֵ֔נִי <WH3707> that they might provoke me to anger בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> with all the works יְדֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3027> of their hands וְנִצְּתָ֧ה <WH3341> shall be kindled חֲמָתִ֛י <WH2534> therefore my wrath בַּמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> against this place הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִכְבֶּֽה׃ <WH3518> and shall not be quenched

וְאֶל־ <WH413> to מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> But to the king יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> of Judah הַשֹּׁלֵ֤חַ <WH7971> which sent אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> you to enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> thus תֹאמְר֖וּ <WH559> thus shall ye say אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> to him כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> to him Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> [As touching] the words אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁמָֽעְתָּ׃ <WH8085> which thou hast heard

יַ֠עַן <WH3282> because רַךְ־ <WH7401> was tender לְבָ֨בְךָ֜ <WH3824> Because thine heart וַתִּכָּנַ֣ע ׀ <WH3665> and thou hast humbled מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> thyself before יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD בְּֽשָׁמְעֲךָ֡ <WH8085> when thou heardest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> what דִּבַּרְתִּי֩ <WH1696> what I spake עַל־ <WH5921> against הַמָּק֨וֹם <WH4725> against this place הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> this וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against יֹשְׁבָ֗יו <WH3427> and against the inhabitants לִהְי֤וֹת <WH1961> become לְשַׁמָּה֙ <WH8047> thereof that they should become a desolation וְלִקְלָלָ֔ה <WH7045> and a curse וַתִּקְרַע֙ <WH7167> and hast rent אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדֶ֔יךָ <WH899> thy clothes וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ה <WH1058> and wept לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> truly אָנֹכִ֛י <WH595> I שָׁמַ֖עְתִּי <WH8085> me I also have heard נְאֻם־ <WH5002> [thee] saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> Therefore הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold אֹֽסִפְךָ֜ <WH622> Behold therefore I will gather עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲבֹתֶ֗יךָ <WH1> thee unto thy fathers וְנֶאֱסַפְתָּ֣ <WH622> and thou shalt be gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to קִבְרֹתֶיךָ֮ <WH6913> into thy grave בְּשָׁלוֹם֒ <WH7965> in peace וְלֹא־ <WH3808> will not תִרְאֶ֣ינָה <WH7200> shall not see עֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> and thine eyes בְּכֹל֙ <WH3605> all הָֽרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> all the evil אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I מֵבִ֖יא <WH935> which I will bring עַל־ <WH5921> upon הַמָּק֣וֹם <WH4725> upon this place הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> this וַיָּשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> word
